Thank you so much promodsharma! 
For this upgrade you need Zbrush 4r2 or 4r2b.

1) Download zbrush 4r2 
(Heres the link on TPB that i got it from http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7040876/Pixologic_Zbrush_4.0_R2)
2) Do not activate the software
3) Go to Pixologic to download a 200 MB free upgrade file.
Theres instructions on the website and are easy to follow (Heres the link http://www.pixologic.com/zbrush/downloadcenter/instructions.php)
4) Put the upgrader file in your zbrush root directory and open it.
5) Once installed/patched, open zbrush
6) Disconnect from the internet and using THIS keygen put in your registration code
7) ENJOY!!!
Amazing! Thank you so much for this ^_^
